// src/components/PieChart.js
import React from'react';import{Pie}from'react-chartjs-2';import{Chart as ChartJS,Title,Tooltip,Legend,ArcElement}from'chart.js';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";ChartJS.register(Title,Tooltip,Legend,ArcElement);const PieChart=_ref=>{let{data}=_ref;const chartData={labels:data.map(expense=>expense.type),datasets:[{label:'Expense Breakdown',data:data.map(expense=>expense.amount),backgroundColor:['rgba(255, 99, 132, 0.2)','rgba(54, 162, 235, 0.2)','rgba(255, 206, 86, 0.2)','rgba(75, 192, 192, 0.2)','rgba(153, 102, 255, 0.2)'],borderColor:['rgba(255, 99, 132, 1)','rgba(54, 162, 235, 1)','rgba(255, 206, 86, 1)','rgba(75, 192, 192, 1)','rgba(153, 102, 255, 1)'],borderWidth:1}]};const options={responsive:true,plugins:{legend:{position:'top'},tooltip:{callbacks:{label:tooltipItem=>{return"".concat(tooltipItem.label,": ").concat(tooltipItem.raw);}}}},maintainAspectRatio:false};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"pie-chart-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Expense Pie Chart"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Pie,{data:chartData,options:options,height:200,width:200})]});};export default PieChart;
